languages.text: {n}Служители Кровавой паутины совершили ряд молниеносных и безмолвных нападений, сложив из трупов мрачные послания. Напуганные неуловимыми убийцами в тенях, еретики покинули логова и бежали в дальние тоннели. Бунт был обезглавлен.{/n}

{n}The servants of the Bloodspun Web launched a series of lightning-fast and silent attacks, stacking the corpses as grim messages. Frightened by the elusive and shadowy assassins, the heretics abandoned their lairs and fled into distant tunnels. The rebellion was decapitated.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Служители Кровавой паутины совершили ряд молниеносных и безмолвных нападений, сложив из трупов мрачные послания. Напуганные неуловимыми убийцами в тенях, еретики покинули логова и бежали в дальние тоннели. Бунт был обезглавлен.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The servants of the Bloodspun Web launched a series of lightning-fast and silent attacks, stacking the corpses with grim messages. Frightened by the elusive and shadowy assassins, the heretics abandoned their lairs and fled into distant tunnels. The rebellion was decapitated.{/n}

{n}The servants of the Bloodspun Web launched a series of lightning-fast and silent attacks, stacking the corpses as grim messages. Frightened by the elusive and shadowy assassins, the heretics abandoned their lairs and fled into distant tunnels. The rebellion was decapitated.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Diener des Blutgesponnenen Netzes haben einige blitzschnelle und lautlose Angriffe gestartet und die Leichen als grimmige Botschaft gestapelt. Aus Furcht vor den schattenhaften Assassinen flohen die Ketzer aus ihren Verstecken in ferne Tunnel. Die Rebellion war enthauptet worden.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servants of the Bloodspun Web launched a series of lightning-fast and silent attacks, stacking the corpses as grim messages. Frightened by the elusive and shadowy assassins, the heretics abandoned their lairs and fled into distant tunnels. The rebellion was decapitated.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Diener des Blutgesponnenen Netzes haben einige blitzschnelle und lautlose Angriffe gestartet und die Leichen als grimmige Botschaft gestapelt. Aus Furcht vor den schattenhaften Assassinen flohen die Ketzer aus ihren Verstecken in ferne Tunnel. Die Rebellion war enthauptet worden.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les serviteurs de la Toile de Sang ont orchestré une série d'attaques aussi discrètes que fulgurantes, empilant les cadavres comme autant de mises en garde à l'attention de leurs comparses. Effrayés par ces assassins ténébreux et insaisissables, les hérétiques ont quitté leurs repaires pour se réfugier dans des tunnels reculés et la rébellion a été étouffée dans l'œuf.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servants of the Bloodspun Web launched a series of lightning-fast and silent attacks, stacking the corpses as grim messages. Frightened by the elusive and shadowy assassins, the heretics abandoned their lairs and fled into distant tunnels. The rebellion was decapitated.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les serviteurs de la Toile de Sang ont orchestré une série d'attaques aussi discrètes que fulgurantes, empilant les cadavres comme autant de mises en garde à l'attention de leurs comparses. Effrayés par ces assassins ténébreux et insaisissables, les hérétiques ont quitté leurs repaires pour se réfugier dans des tunnels reculés et la rébellion a été étouffée dans l'œuf.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los sirvientes de la Red Sanguinolenta lanzaron una serie de ataques silenciosos y veloces, amontonando los cadáveres a modo de mensaje. Aterrados por los esquivos asesinos de las sombras, los herejes dejaron sus guaridas y huyeron a lejanos túneles. La rebelión quedó decapitada.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servants of the Bloodspun Web launched a series of lightning-fast and silent attacks, stacking the corpses as grim messages. Frightened by the elusive and shadowy assassins, the heretics abandoned their lairs and fled into distant tunnels. The rebellion was decapitated.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los sirvientes de la Red Sanguinolenta lanzaron una serie de ataques silenciosos y veloces, amontonando los cadáveres a modo de mensaje. Aterrados por los esquivos asesinos de las sombras, los herejes dejaron sus guaridas y huyeron a lejanos túneles. La rebelión quedó decapitada.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ブラッドスパン・ウェブの従者たちは、電光石火の速さで無音攻撃を仕掛け、屍を積み重ねるという不吉なメッセージを残した。正体が知れず、影のような暗殺者たちに怯えた異端者どもは隠れ家を捨て、遠くのトンネルへと逃げ込んだ。反乱軍どもはその首を落とされた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servants of the Bloodspun Web launched a series of lightning-fast and silent attacks, stacking the corpses as grim messages. Frightened by the elusive and shadowy assassins, the heretics abandoned their lairs and fled into distant tunnels. The rebellion was decapitated.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ブラッドスパン・ウェブの従者たちは、電光石火の速さで無音攻撃を仕掛け、屍を積み重ねるという不吉なメッセージを残した。正体が知れず、影のような暗殺者たちに怯えた異端者どもは隠れ家を捨て、遠くのトンネルへと逃げ込んだ。反乱軍どもはその首を落とされた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}织血罗网的仆人们如同闪电一般，发动了一系列袭击，把所有猎物的尸体堆积起来，恫吓敌人。这群神秘莫测的刺客吓坏了那些异端分子，他们纷纷放弃了自己的巢穴，逃进了遥远的隧道里，叛乱也因此戛然而止。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servants of the Bloodspun Web launched a series of lightning-fast and silent attacks, stacking the corpses as grim messages. Frightened by the elusive and shadowy assassins, the heretics abandoned their lairs and fled into distant tunnels. The rebellion was decapitated.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}织血罗网的仆人们如同闪电一般，发动了一系列袭击，把所有猎物的尸体堆积起来，恫吓敌人。这群神秘莫测的刺客吓坏了那些异端分子，他们纷纷放弃了自己的巢穴，逃进了遥远的隧道里，叛乱也因此戛然而止。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kanipi Ağı'nın hizmetkârları, sessiz ama şimşek gibi hızlı bir dizi saldırıyla cesetleri üst üste yığarak korkunç bir mesaj verdi. Ele avuca sığmayan, karanlık suikastçılardan korkan kâfirler ise inlerini terk edip uzak tünellere kaçtı. İsyanın başı kesildi.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servants of the Bloodspun Web launched a series of lightning-fast and silent attacks, stacking the corpses as grim messages. Frightened by the elusive and shadowy assassins, the heretics abandoned their lairs and fled into distant tunnels. The rebellion was decapitated.{/n}
